text: Septian David Maulana (born 2 September 1996) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a attacking midfielder or winger for PSIS Semarang and the Indonesia national team. == Club career == In December 2014, Septian signed a contract with Mitra Kukar. He made his debut on 5 April 2015 after replacing Jajang Mulyana in the 73rd minute, which ended 1–0 defeat against Persebaya Surabaya at Gelora Bung Tomo Stadium. In next match, he scored his first goal in the 35th minute against Gresik United. In September 2019, with a salary of 3.6 billion rupiah, he's the most expensive player at PSIS Semarang. == Career statistics == === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ International statistics |- ! colspan=4 | Indonesia national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2016||2||0 |- |2017||4||2 |- |2018||6||0 |- |2019||1||0 |- !Total||13||2 |} === International goals === :Scores and results list Indonesia's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
